participant_1.background:
I love to experiment with different colors and styles, and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself through my clothing.
i love to swim.
my favorite band is the beatles.
I met the creators of my favorite comic book series at a comic con in Russia.
I was recently bedridden for a week, so I had to eat a lot of soft foods that were easy to digest.

participant_2.background:
My first purchase was a journal that I would fill with my thoughts and reflections.
I work a lifeguard during summer and help out at my family's restaurant during the off season.
i have a timeshare in mexico.
I like to go to concerts and other events where I can show off my leather outfits.
I rent an apartment to have more space for my sewing machine and gaming consoles.

content.text: The Beatles are my favorite band, they have such a classic sound.
I agree, they are one of my favorite bands as well! My first concert was a Beatles cover band.
That's awesome! I went to a Beatles concert in Russia last year, it was amazing.
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to go to Russia.
You should go! It's a beautiful country with so much to see and do.
I'll definitely have to put it on my bucket list.
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to sew and play video games. I also like to go to concerts and other events.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to swim and read.
Swimming is a great way to relax and get some exercise.
It is! I'm glad we have some things in common.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who has similar interests
